description:
Gusion Rebake has been upgraded by Teiwaz into a new form after sustaining severe damage. It retains its previous gimmicks of high-sensitivity camera sensors in the head for long-range precision fire and a "face open" mode for close-range use, and new armament has also been added, including weapons more specialized for close combat.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: ASW-G-11 Gundam Gusion Rebake Full City
